verses.verse: <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man <S%G1294>perverting<s%> the <S%G1484>nation,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2967>forbidding<s%> <S%G1325>paying<s%> <S%G5411>taxes<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying<s%> that he <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> a <S%G935>king.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> "I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> basis for a <S%G158>charge<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>"

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G5463>was<s%> <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>for<s%> a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G1223>time,<s%> because he had <S%G191>heard<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1679>hoped<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "You <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one that <S%G654>perverts<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>see,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G350>examined<s%> him <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> basis for a <S%G158>charge<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> concerning those things <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the third <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why?<s%> <S%G1063>What<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G4160>has<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4160>done?<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2288>capital<s%> <S%G158>crime<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> I <S%G3811>will<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>chastise<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G630>him.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> they were <S%G1945>urgent<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G154>asking<s%> <S%G4717>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the voices of the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2729>prevailed.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> had been <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4714>insurrection<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5408>murder,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G154>asked,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> up to <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2307>will.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> they <S%G520>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G520>away,<s%> they <S%G1949>grabbed<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G68>country,<s%> <S%G2007>and<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> to <S%G5342>carry<s%> it <S%G3693>after<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they will <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G3107><s%> 'Blessed are the <S%G4723>barren,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G2836>wombs<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G1080>bore,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G2337>nursed.<s%>'

<S%G5119>Then<s%> they will <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G4098><s%> 'Fall <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us!<s%>' <S%G2532>and<s%> tell the <S%G1015>hills,<s%> <S%G2572><s%> 'Cover <S%G2248>us.<s%>'

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5200>green<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3584>dry?<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>When<s%> they <S%G565>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> The <S%G2898>Skull,<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> the <S%G2557>criminals,<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3739>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G710>left.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> they are <S%G4160>doing.<s%>" <S%G1266>Dividing<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> among <S%G906>them,<s%> they cast <S%G2819>lots.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2334>watching.<s%> <S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1592>scoffed<s%> at <S%G3004>him,<s%> saying, "He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others.<s%> Let him <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> his chosen <S%G1588>one!<s%>"

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1346>justly,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G618>receive<s%> the due <S%G514>reward<s%> <S%G3739>for<s%> our <S%G4238>deeds,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> has <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G824>wrong.<s%>"
<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>torn<s%> in <S%G3319>two.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5455>crying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit!<s%>" <S%G2532>Having<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> he breathed his <S%G1606>last.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> came <S%G4836>together<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2335>see<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> when they <S%G2334>saw<s%> the things <S%G3778>that<s%> were <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> home <S%G5180>beating<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G4738>breasts.<s%>
<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G5225>Joseph,<s%> who was a member of the <S%G1010>council,<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>

<S%G846>(he<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4784>consented<s%> to their <S%G1012>counsel<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4234>deed<s%>), <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4327>waiting<s%> <S%G2532>for<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>He<s%> took it <S%G2507>down,<s%> and <S%G1794>wrapped<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> in a <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G2532>cloth,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3418>tomb<s%> that was cut in <S%G2991>stone,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G3756>ever<s%> <S%G3764>been<s%> <S%G2749>laid.<s%>
<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G3904>Preparation,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was drawing <S%G2020>near.<s%>

The <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G4905>come<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> followed <S%G2628>after,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> was <S%G5087>laid.<s%>
